Class Tank

    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Troops

  • public class Tank
extends Troops
    Tank is a troop that has high health, low speed, and medium damage

    April 2020
    Author:
    Roy Sun

        public Tank​(boolean isRed)

      • Tank

        public Tank​(boolean isRed,
            int hp,
            int maxHp,
            int speed,
            int damage,
            int sight)
        Create a Tank of the specified team, with specified hp, speed, damage, and sight range.
        Parameters:
        isRed - True if red team, false if blue team.
        hp - HP the tank starts with.
        speed - Speed the tank marches downt the battlefield.
        damage - Damage the tank's bullets deal.
        sight - Sight range of the tank.
